metadata.title: Creed Trilogy
metadata.director: Ryan Coogler, Steven Caple Jr., Michael B. Jordan

content.short_description: The movie follows the life of Adonis Creed, the son of famous boxer Apollo Creed, as he struggles with his life in and out of the ring. He finds an unlikely mentor in the form of Rocky Balboa, his father’s old friend and rival, who helps him navigate his life and personal relationships while preparing for the boxing championship.
